name: Baby Hazel Bathroom Hygiene
description:
Play Baby Hazel Bathroom Hygiene game for free. In this game you get a chance to help and teach Baby Hazel to keep her bathroom neat and clean.

We all know that hygiene is very important for a healthy living, including bathroom hygiene. But our darling Hazel is unaware about maintaining a good hygiene in bathroom. Can you teach Baby Hazel the appropriate ways of keeping the bathroom clean and tidy? First of all help her in clearing the mess in washroom. Secondly, advice her on cleaning the bathroom accessories. And lastly, not to miss the personal hygiene! Give Hazel a refreshing bath and trim her nails. Its a great fun to learn bathroom hygiene with Baby Hazel!
